name: Agroforestry in the Barents Region
description: The objective of the project is to combine agricultural and forestry technologies aiming to create diverse, productive, profitable, healthy, ecologically sound and sustainable land-use systems for improved availability of NTFP raw materials in the Barents region. Such a land-use system is called agroforestry. agroforestry is always a governed, target-oriented concept in which investments are used or alternative costs are accepted in order to achieve the most profitable output
